channel.title: Making an item change prayer books
channel.description: How would I make it so that when I click an item (For example a book) it will switch prayers from normal to curses. then when i click it again it switches them back to normal ?

item.title: Making an item change prayer books
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Tutorial:

There is an item clicking packet. Look for that and see how to go from there.

This…
But I’ll expand on what tutorial said to make it a bit more helpful.

Every action on items (With the exception of use and examine) sends data to the client in a packet (use only sends once it’s been used on another item/object/player/etc).

These packets are as follows:
First click item
Equip item
Alternate second click item
Third click item (Not documented on wiki - packet 75)

It’d be easiest if you add a statement to each of them to know which one is being sent when you click them, something like:

could be added to each packet (Changing the X to the number of the action and the itemIdVariable to the actual variable name used in each packet.

From there it’s as simple as adding in a case or if statement to the existing code, and changing the spellbook interface (Which there is a packet for and should be in your server already)

Read full topic
item.source: Making an item change prayer books
